plays.text: Penalty to Aaron Miller 2 minutes for Hooking Justin Williams

Goal scored by Eric Weinrich assisted by Jeremy Roenick and Mark Recchi
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Interference Andreas Lilja
Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Elbowing Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Slashing Keith Primeau
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Hooking Andreas Lilja
Penalty to Bryan Smolinski 2 minutes for Roughing Kent Manderville
Goal scored by Simon Gagne unassisted
